data.eml:eml: The FranKliniella fauna of Brazil: additions and updated key to species (Thysanoptera: Thripidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miyasato, Elisa Aiko (2017): The FranKliniella fauna of Brazil: additions and updated key to species (Thysanoptera: Thripidae). Zootaxa 4323 (3): 391-402, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4323.3.3
